overview:
One of the leading business angels and early-stage private investors in Russia

Founder of Actis Systems (www.actis.ru) - leading Russian web design company (now part of Wunderman), AdWatch (www.adwatch.ru) - leading online ad agency (now part of Isobar/Aegis), Sputnik Labs - leading provider of CRM solutions in Russia (now TechnoServ Consulting) and several other companies.

As General Manager Pavel was involved in establishing Russian business of Siebel Systems (now Oracle), Adobe, Microsoft Advertising.

As private investor and mentor Pavel supported several successful online startups, including Tvigle (www.tvigle.ru) - leading online TV portal in Russia, Toonbox (www.toonbox.ru) - award-winning cartoon producer, ID East (www.id-east.ru) - leading mobile app developer, Krible (www.krible.ru), Copiny (www.copiny.com) and many others.
